teas.name: Black Tea
teas.description: A fully oxidized tea with a bold and robust flavor.

teas.name: Green Tea
teas.description: A lightly oxidized tea with a delicate and grassy flavor.

teas.name: White Tea
teas.description: A minimally processed tea with a subtle and delicate flavor.

teas.name: Oolong Tea
teas.description: A partially oxidized tea with a diverse range of flavors, from floral to toasty.

teas.name: Herbal Tea
teas.description: A caffeine-free infusion made from dried herbs, fruits, flowers, or spices.

teas.name: Chai Tea
teas.description: A spiced tea blend with black tea, milk, and a combination of spices.

teas.name: Earl Grey Tea
teas.description: A flavored black tea infused with bergamot oil.

teas.name: Jasmine Tea
teas.description: A scented tea made by blending green tea leaves with jasmine flowers.

teas.name: Matcha Tea
teas.description: A powdered green tea whisked into hot water.

teas.name: Rooibos Tea
teas.description: A caffeine-free herbal tea made from the leaves of the Rooibos plant.

teas.name: Darjeeling Tea
teas.description: A black tea from the Darjeeling region of India with a muscatel flavor.

teas.name: Assam Tea
teas.description: A bold and malty black tea from the Assam region of India.

teas.name: Pu-erh Tea
teas.description: A fermented tea with an earthy and rich flavor.

teas.name: Sencha Tea
teas.description: A popular Japanese green tea with a refreshing and grassy flavor.

teas.name: Gunpowder Tea
teas.description: A Chinese green tea rolled into small pellets resembling gunpowder.

teas.name: Genmaicha
teas.description: A Japanese green tea blended with toasted rice.

teas.name: Chamomile Tea
teas.description: An herbal tea made from dried chamomile flowers.

teas.name: Peppermint Tea
teas.description: A refreshing herbal tea made from dried peppermint leaves.

teas.name: Hibiscus Tea
teas.description: A vibrant red herbal tea made from the dried petals of the hibiscus flower.

teas.name: Lemon Ginger Tea
teas.description: A herbal tea blend combining the zesty flavor of lemon with the warmth of ginger.

teas.name: White Peony Tea
teas.description: A type of white tea made from the young leaves and unopened buds of the tea plant.

teas.name: Earl Grey Green Tea
teas.description: A variation of Earl Grey tea where green tea leaves are scented with bergamot oil.

teas.name: Yerba Mate
teas.description: A traditional South American herbal tea made from the leaves of the yerba mate plant.

teas.name: Mint Tea
teas.description: A herbal tea made from spearmint or peppermint leaves.

teas.name: Rooibos Chai
teas.description: A caffeine-free version of chai tea made with rooibos as the base.

teas.name: Lemon Verbena Tea
teas.description: An herbal tea made from the leaves of the lemon verbena plant.

teas.name: White Silver Needle Tea
teas.description: A highly prized white tea made from the unopened buds of the tea plant.

teas.name: Jasmine Dragon Pearl Tea
teas.description: A high-quality green tea scented with jasmine flowers and hand-rolled into small pearls.

teas.name: Darjeeling First Flush Tea
teas.description: A premium black tea from the first harvest of the season in the Darjeeling region.

teas.name: Ceylon Tea
teas.description: A black tea from Sri Lanka (formerly Ceylon) with varying flavors and strengths.
